Actions.Name: Entombment of Iz
Actions.Description: The [name] entombs a character in range in a magical sarcophagus, summoning it in their space. If a character is defeated in the sarcophagus, it crumbles and this effect ends.

Summons.Name: Sarcophagus of Iz
Summons.SummonEffects: Shares space with a character. While sharing space with the sarcophagus, they must sacrifice 3 at the start of their turn and are immobile, but can otherwise be targeted normally. The Sarcophagus takes no damage from Relict and only 1 damage maximum from any ability from a foe inside of it.

Actions.Name: Dark Redempta
Actions.Description: Target defeated relict in range and remove incapacitated. They stop being defeated and return to the battlefield with 50% hp, or 25% hp if they are an elite. They can act normally and take a turn starting next round. If defeated again, they disintegrate and are removed from the battlefield, and cannot be returned again.
